column4: Can other people get sound working with flash in Firefox/Opera with Breezy?
Although I don't use flash myself, I suggest it may be an issue of OSS vs ALSA support.
OSS is an older Linux sound standard. Alsa is a new, highly featured system. I suppose Flash uses the older system.
This then becomes a question of whenther your distro installs OSS compatability for your sound card.
